abstract: This season’s final “So You Think You Can Dance” performances lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday.
snippet: This season’s final “So You Think You Can Dance” performances lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: This season’s final “So You Think You Can Dance” performances lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Wednesday as an average of 8.7 million viewers tuned in to the show from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
